document.full_text: the european union is expected to expand its sanctions against iran significantly monday, reflecting growing frustration among western powers with a lack of progress in nuclear talks with tehran, eu diplomats said.
document.title: eu set sharply to expand iran sanctions: diplomats
lines_and_colors: the european union is expected to expand its sanctions against iran significantly monday, reflecting growing frustration among western powers with a lack of progress in nuclear talks with tehran, eu diplomats said.
